instance_deactivate_object: With this function you can deactivate a single instance or all instances of a specific object from all those that have been activated previously. Note that if you have deactivated an instance or object that has been flagged as Persistent, then you will need to reactivate it again with the function instance_activate_object() before changing room, otherwise it will not be carried over and will be discarded instead. Note too that deactivation is not instantaneous, and an instance that has been deactivated in this way will not be considered to be inactive until the end of the event in which the function was called.
